document.full_text: house and senate leaders dedicated a bronze statue of president gerald ford on tuesday, remembering the former michigan lawmaker as a man of integrity who helped the nation heal from the watergate crisis.
document.title: bronze statue of gerald ford dedicated in capitol
lines_and_colors: house and senate leaders dedicated a bronze statue of president gerald ford on tuesday, remembering the former michigan lawmaker as a man of integrity who helped the nation heal from the watergate crisis.
